price: Дедилар: «Бут-санамларга ибодат қиляпмиз ва уларга содиқ қолурмиз».
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
